thread.title: Bulls' Rose looks totally uncomfortable in his protective mask
thread.title_full: Bulls' Rose looks totally uncomfortable in his protective mask

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Bulls' Rose looks totally uncomfortable in his protective mask
text:
Bulls' Rose looks totally uncomfortable in his protective mask SB Nation 2 hrs ago Whitney Medworth Â© Provided by SB Nation Derrick Rose suffered a fractured left orbital bone back in the beginning of training camp for the Chicago Bulls and has been recovering ever since. This week Rose was given a face mask to wear so he can continue to get ready for the 2015-16 season. Unfortunately, it looks like this face mask is highly uncomfortable for him. It looks too tight. It looks like he can't see. It just looks bad all around. Not to mention this mask has given him permanent stink face.
Get well soon, Derrick. That looks awful.
